document_data.mainbody:
All Things Through the Bright Flames is an ebook fan-fiction novella by Ed Greenwood, set in the Forgotten Realms, released in late 2016.
As a work of fan-fiction, despite the fact that it is written by the Forgotten Realms creator, All Things Through the Bright Flames is not a canonical work.
Originally released on the DMs Guild as-is, this novella was taken down off the website with no explanation, only to be replaced six days later with a Dungeons & Dragons rules appendix included.
